title: Is it enough to pour water over the limb and rub it over the area
transcript:
[Questioner] from India when washing body parts 
in wudu is it enough to pour little water over   the limb and rub it to the entire area or should 
we pour water all over the limb because I take   a long time in with the pouring water over 
my face arms feet under the feet Etc please   clarify thank you when we wash our hands we just 
put some water here and then I raise my hand and   the water are dripping a little bit and I just do 
this that's it that's one way when I put water in   my hand and I wash my face thoroughly this does 
the job so you this is sufficient insha Allah
